name: Kids These Days Teaser
description:
UPDATE: For some reason the executable file isn't creating a save directory and causing bugs. We have uploaded a quick fix while we try and figure out the issue. Please download the patch as well and extract the files to the folder that the executable is installed in. Sorry for the inconvenience.

Kids These Days is a turn based JRPG where you play as three kids who are chosen

by circumstance to be the heroes that their land needs. 

Run time: 20 minutes for just the teaser. Up to an hour for 100% completion.

This is a teaser just to test the waters and see if people are interested in the characters and the presentation of the game. There is a survey button in game that

is imperative to the future of this game's development.

There is a secret boss hidden in this teaser. The first person to send a video of them beating the boss to Jazz's twitter (@jazzind_) will receive a free copy of the game on release. Thank you all for your time and we hope you enjoy, Kids These Days.
